pages.title: Millhouse
pages.text: Having $(item)Chili Peppers$() is great for that spicy flavour, but it doesn't do much for helping any other part of the situation here. You can however, construct a $(item)Mill$() from stone to crush the $(item)Chili$() into a more reactive $(item)Powder$().

pages.heading: Chili Powder
pages.description: Mill will output into any adjacent block which has an inventory
